title: National Manufacturing Day, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation declaring October 3, 2025, as National Manufacturing Day. It highlights the importance of manufacturing to the U.S. economy and outlines the administration's efforts to restore industrial power, including securing $5 trillion in investments, creating jobs, and implementing reciprocal tariffs to protect American manufacturing. The proclamation also mentions the elimination of burdensome regulations and the passage of the One Big Beautiful Bill Act, which provides 100 percent immediate expensing for new factories. The administration's focus on workforce development and the use of artificial intelligence to boost productivity is also noted. The proclamation calls on all Americans to celebrate the contributions of manufacturers and workers to the nation's strength and prosperity.
